name: Borderlands 3: Moxxi’s Heist of the Handsome Jackpot
name_original: Borderlands 3: Moxxi’s Heist of the Handsome Jackpot
description: Ready for the biggest score of your loot-hunting career? Moxxi has just the job for you, sugar: a good old-fashioned heist. Join her crew of ragtag "experts," battle your way through Hyperion security forces and crazed casino-goers, and claim The Handsome Jackpot's vault of loot ...
